title: FPS Issues
body:
One of my friends has been playing League for almost a year, and she's had very few issues with internet connection/FPS, but now there's a pretty big problem that she's never had before and it's ruining her games. Her FPS, which usually is 100-200, dropped to 20 and stayed there. Also, her client has been extremely laggy since her FPS was stuck at 20 for multiple games. 

She tried almost everything, but it only fixed her issue a tiny bit. It's gotten better she says, but it's still an issue and her client is still extremely laggy. Any suggestions?

replies.body:
Has your friend recently updated Windows?  Her drivers may be out of date and her may PC may just need a general tune-up.  I'd suggest she goes over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to get things fixed up.

If she still continues to lag, running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for those specific games can help figure out what's going wrong, in addition to troubleshooting steps for it.  I hope that helps!
Thank you! Her frames are back to normal now :D
